title: Life is Good font
content:
Does anyone know what the font is that is used for the logo of the "Life is good" company and t-shirts? Here's a link: it's the blue & white logo in the upper left corner of the page.

[http://www.lifeisgood.com/category/women/short-sleeve-tees-tops/graphic-...](http://web.archive.org/web/20111210174724/http:/www.lifeisgood.com/category/women/short-sleeve-tees-tops/graphic-crusher-tees.aspx "http://www.lifeisgood.com/category/women/short-sleeve-tees-tops/graphic-crusher-tees.aspx")
author: kvanderbilt

comments.content: I don't think that's a font. Each <cite>i</cite> and <cite>o</cite> is different.
Hm... how about the font used in the headers (women, men, headwear, etc.)?

It is custom artwork. See [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20111210174724/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=45805) and [thsi one, too](http://web.archive.org/web/20111210174724/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=47416) for reasonable substitutes.
